# Scope

```{r Scope, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}
scope_keys=get_unique_keys(params$pipeline$scope)

for (scope_element in scope_keys) {
    new_scope_element_name = camel(scope_element)
    cat(paste('## ', new_scope_element_name, sep=''), sep = '\n')
    cat('\n')
    cat(params$pipeline$scope[[scope_element]], sep = '\n')
}
```
